smell_analysis.justification: No empty diagrams were found. All 18 pages contain at least one element.

On page 2 (Use case diagram 'Ronimisseinte funktsionaalne allsüsteem'), all use case ovals are associated with at least one actor. The use case 'Tuvasta kasutaja' is connected via «include» relationships to use cases that have direct actor associations. Page 1 contains text lists inside Package symbols which are explicitly excluded from this rule.

No duplicate use cases with same/similar activity names associated with the same actor were found. All 11 use cases on page 2 describe distinct activities: Tuvasta kasutaja, Vaata ronimisseinte koondaruannet, Lõpeta ronimissein, Registreeri ronimissein, Muuda ronimisseina, Aktiveeri ronimissein, Muuda ronimissein mittaktiivseks, Vaata aktiivseid ronimisseinu, Vaata kõiki ronimisseinu, Vaata kõiki ootel või mitteaktiivseid ronimisseinu, Unusta ronimissein.

No package contains multiple model elements with the same name. Each element name is unique within its respective package (Isikute register, Töötajate register, Klassifikaatorite register, Ronimisseinte register, Klientide register).

Columns with similar names like 'nimetus', 'on_aktiivne', and 'isik_id' appear in multiple tables, but these represent different contexts (classifier names, status flags, foreign key references). All shared data between tables is connected via FK relationships as shown in the transformed diagrams (pages 13-18).

All use cases on page 2 follow consistent verb-first naming: Tuvasta (Identify), Vaata (View), Lõpeta (End), Registreeri (Register), Muuda (Change), Aktiveeri (Activate), Unusta (Forget). All names begin with Estonian imperative verbs.

On page 11 (Ronimisseinte seisundidiagramm), all 6 states are reachable: Alg→Ootel (initial registration), Ootel→Aktiivne/Unustatud, Aktiivne→Mitteaktiivne/Lõpetatud, Mitteaktiivne→Aktiivne/Lõpetatud. Every state has at least one incoming transition path from the initial state.

On page 3 (Activity diagram), all actions are reachable from Algus via the flow: Algus→Vaata kõiki ronimisseinu→decisions→Otsi/Vali/Lõpeta→Lõpp. On page 4, all actions are reachable from Algus via: Algus→Vaatab kõiki ootel→decisions→Valib/Aktiveerimine/Andmed→Lõpp.

All association relationships in class diagrams (pages 5-12) and database diagrams (pages 13-18) have multiplicity indicators on both ends (e.g., '1', '0..1', '0..*'). Generalization/inheritance relationships (shown in pages 7-8) do not require multiplicities per UML standard.

Diagram 'Ronimisseinte funktsionaalne allsüsteem' on page 2 contains 11 use cases. Counted: (1) Tuvasta kasutaja, (2) Vaata ronimisseinte koondaruannet, (3) Lõpeta ronimissein, (4) Registreeri ronimissein, (5) Muuda ronimisseina, (6) Aktiveeri ronimissein, (7) Muuda ronimissein mittaktiivseks, (8) Vaata aktiivseid ronimisseinu, (9) Vaata kõiki ronimisseinu, (10) Vaata kõiki ootel või mitteaktiivseid ronimisseinu, (11) Unusta ronimissein = 11 total. Threshold is ≥10. 11 ≥ 10, therefore smell IS present.

Analyzed all class/database diagrams for visual connection lines. Maximum connections found: Page 6 (Isik): 5 lines (to Kasutajakonto, Töötaja, Klient, Riik, Isiku_seisundi_liik). Page 10 (Ronimissein): 5 lines (to Töötaja×2, Ronimisseina_seisundi_liik, Ronimisseina_kategooria_omamine, Ronimisseina_liik). Page 17 (Ronimissein): 5 lines. Maximum is 5. Threshold is ≥6. Since 5 < 6, smell is NOT present.
Visual inspection of all diagrams shows related elements are positioned proximately. No relationship distances appear to exceed twice the average distance between elements on any diagram.

Activity diagram on page 4 contains actions that do not start with active verbs: (1) 'Aktiveerimine ebaõnnestub' starts with noun 'Aktiveerimine' (Activation), (2) 'Andmed salvestatakse ning ronimissein muudetakse aktiivseks' starts with noun 'Andmed' (Data). These should start with verbs like 'Ebaõnnestu aktiveerimine' or 'Salvesta andmed'.

All names in the model have 4 or more characters. Shortest names found include: Classes (Isik=4, Riik=4, Klient=6), Attributes (parool=6, eesnimi=7, elukoht=7), Use cases (all >10 chars). Threshold is ≤3. All names have ≥4 characters, therefore smell is NOT present.
All class names start with uppercase letters and are singular: Isik, Kasutajakonto, Töötaja, Klient, Klassifikaator, Riik, Ronimissein, Ronimisseina_kategooria, etc.
All attribute/column names start with lowercase letters: e_meil, eesnimi, isikukood, reg_aeg, on_aktiivne, parool, nimetus, kommentaar, raskusaste, isik_id, etc.

All database table names are singular: Isik (Person), Kasutajakonto (User account), Klient (Client), Tootaja (Worker), Ronimissein (Climbing wall), Riik (Country), Tootaja_rolli_omamine, Ronimisseina_kategooria_omamine, and all classifier tables.

No type prefixes (tbl_, uc_, str, int, etc.) were found in class, table, or attribute names. The prefixes PK_, FK_, pfK, and IXFK_ found in database diagrams are explicitly allowed per the rule definition as they indicate primary keys, foreign keys, partial foreign keys, and indexes.
